TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DocIdLookup extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a way locate a document or collection of documents based on Document ID.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of a object.

static member DoSearch : Microsoft.SharePoint.SPSite * string -> string[]

Docs.param: An object that specifies the site in which to search for documents with the provided object
A string that specifies the object
Docs.summary: Returns an array of URLs that point to documents with the specified object.
Docs.returns: A string array of URLs that point to documents that are associated with the specified

remarks.para: This method is called when a user is trying to locate a document by its Document ID. Depending on the default Document ID Provider registered, it may use custom provider search functionality. If the property for the provider is set to false, it uses the default search funtionality.
